title: Rito, Since we doin new starts can I get my original account back?
body:
U permabanned incarinat0n 2 years ago and now hes playing at worlds, pls reconsider lifting my ban. me and him are both pros to some extent (im pro in gold V 0LP) hes pro in EU LCS and worlds (its all relative, same thing tho)

In spirit of this new venture can I get my old account back? it has headless Hecarim which I can't get now T_T
